.. automodule:: obitail
   
   :py:mod:`obitail` specific options
   ----------------------------------   

   .. cmdoption::  -n <INTEGER>, --sequence-count <INTEGER>   
   
        Number of sequence records to be selected (default value : 10).

   .. include:: ../optionsSet/inputformat.txt
